Trade/Device Name(s): GLUCOCARD Shine Connex Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GLUCOCARD Shine Express Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): GLUCOCARD Shine Connex Blood Glucose Meter
GLUCOCARD Shine Express Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GLUCOCARD Shine Connex and Express Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood drawn from the fingertips; intended for single-person self-testing by people with diabetes at home to monitor diabetes control; not for neonates or for diagnosis/screening of diabetes.
